member.name: T:CreatingTypes.CreatingTypes

member.name: M:CreatingTypes.CreatingTypes.FindNthRoot(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Get root of Natural number 'degree' from a Real number 'number' with given 'precision' by using Newton's method
member.param: Needed precision. Must be less than 1
member.exception: Value does not fall within the expected range.
member.returns: Root of number with given precision

member.summary: Default Bubble sorter Sorts array with the given method
member.param: Gets the values to the comparisons
Should program sort by increasing? Default = true
